t: Xtralis. A Leading Global Provider of Solutions for the Very Early & Reliable Detection of Smoke, Fire, and Gas Threats.
s: Xtralis® is a leading global provider of solutions for the very early & reliable detection of smoke, fire, and gas threats. Life Safety Solutions by Xtralis.
Learn more about very early warning aspirating smoke detection (ASD) systems.

May 14, 2024 - Xtralis manufactures VESDA and ICAM brand aspirating smoke detectors (ASD). They also produce ECO, an attachment module for VESDA & ICAM smoke detectors which detects gases by attaching to the ASD pipe network and sampling air that ASD is drawing to detector.
